name: DECONSTRUCTION
description:
DECONSTRUCTION is a fast-paced, hardcore, vertical shooting game.
Control a simple square and avoid bullets, beat the boss and challenge yourself.



* Boss fight only - Direct select the boss you want to fight with.
* Keep it simple - Nothing complex needs to learn, just open the game and start play.



Open the game and press any key, select level and start play.
Control a simple white square to avoid the bullets and shot the various bosses.

Keyboard:

* Move: ↑↓←→
* Shoot: Space
* Cancel: Escape
* Exit: Alt+F4
* Others: Mouse

XBox Gamepad:

* Move: ↑↓←→
* Shoot: A
* Others: Mouse



This is my first indie game and also the first time I release the game on Steam. I know my game is not good in many parts.
I'm still working on how to make it better on Steam and increasing its content.

I'm looking forward to your feedback. (Discussions, Community Group)

Thank you!
